item.title: StarHub introduces WeChat SIM card for tourists from China visiting Singapore
item.description:
StarHub has introduced two new prepaid SIM cards, named “StarHub WeChat Go SIM”, specifically designed for Chinese tourists visiting Singapore. This launch is a collaboration between StarHub and WeChat. The StarHub WeChat Go SIM aims to meet the connectivity needs of the increasing number of Chinese tourists. Data from the Singapore Tourism Board shows a 36% rise in tourists from China in 2016 compared to the previous year. A 2017 Hotels...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starhub-introduces-wechat-sim-card-for-tourists-from-china-visiting-singapore/
